thread.section_title: C2G Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of C2G | www.cablestogo.com | 3 of 63
thread.title: Lee Yates

author: Lee Yates
title: Lee Yates
text:
I will start by saying that I very seldom ignore requests for reviewing products and/or companies. But I can honestly say this is one of the best companies that I have ever worked with! Just like my first order, this one was processed very punctually all the way from the time of order to how quickly it was filled and shipped! I couldn't be more pleased and thanks to all of you there to C2G!
~Lee
